name: SHIPS!
description:
SHIPS! is a local multiplayer game where the players try to destroy each other's ships. The winner is the last player standing.

Features
  • Local multiplayer for 2-4 players on the same device.
  • 4 distinct ship types with unique and interesting weaponry.
  • 8 maps with various types of terrain.
  • A simple damage system: damaging different segments of a ship makes it slower or harder to control depending on the segment.
    • Ship segments have their own health. If two segments are destroyed, the whole ship is destroyed.
  • A simple physics system: in addition to dealing damage, projectiles cause forces to ships. Shooting some weapons also causes recoil.
  • Configurable ship colors.
  • Keyboard and controller support:
    • 1-2 players on the same keyboard.
    • Supported controllers: XInput controllers, Duashock 4, Switch Pro Controller.
    • Rebindable keys/buttons for both keyboard and controllers.
